# gain

**Instance Property**

The overall level for all sounds that an entity emits.

## Declaration

```swift
var gain: Audio.Decibel
```

## Discussion

The gain level is in relative decibels, in the range  `[-Decibel.infinity, Decibel.zero]`, where `Decibel.zero` is the default.
title: gain
